```{r}

library(crossdome)

query <- 'EVDPIGHLY'
background <- cross_universe(allele = "HLA-A*01:01")

result <- cross_compose(query = query, background = background)
show(result)

```

```{r}

result_top <- result %>%
   filter(relatedness_score <= 20)

if(FALSE) {
  cross_write(result_top, file = "crossdome_top_results.tsv")
}

```

```{r}

data('mage_off_targets')

mage_off_targets <- mage_off_targets$peptide_sequence
background <- cross_universe(off_targets = mage_off_targets, allele = "HLA-A*01:01")

result <- cross_compose(query = query, background = background)

```

```{r}

result <- result %>%
  mutate(
    off_target = ifelse(subject %in% mage_off_targets, "Yes", "No")
  )

```
